Article.ArticleTitle: Anxiety and depression in adult cancer patients: ESMO Clinical Practice Guideline.

AbstractText: • Anxiety and depressive disorders are common in patients with cancer. • A higher prevalence seen in patients with cancer than the general population is often underrecognised. • Psychotherapy, cognitive behavioural therapy and mindfulness-based therapies are effective treatments. • Psychopharmacological treatments have been shown to be effective treatments of anxiety and depressive disorders.
